about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Self introduction
about.description:
I am 29 years old and I live in Pelotas - RS - Brazil. I have been working as a Front End Developer since 2004, when I started working at AG2 Publicis Modem, where I worked until March of 2013. In April of 2013 I was invited to work at Nodo, where I have been working at the moment.
I am married, kind of an athlete, maniac for meat, crazy for beer and passionate about traveling.
I am dedicated, organized, engaged and I love what I do.

highlights.title: Work with global companies
highlights.subtitle: I work with large reputable companies from the world market. I have worked on short, medium and long term projects, ranging on average from two weeks to two years, working as a Senior Front End Developer, Team Leader and Technical Responsible.

timeline.description: I work as a Senior Front End Developer, working on national and international projects. Working primarily in mobile projects and projects that required animations.
It is the first agency that I worked at, I started as a trainee and grew up to senior developer. I worked as a team manager and as a technical leader front end on many projects.
I worked as a teacher of tools for web development and participated in the development of an integration system school x student.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom

timeline.description: It prepares professionals to manage projects and their teams in different areas of knowledge, practices using the PMI (Project Management Institute), as well as techniques and necessary tools for their proper development and monitoring in order to reduce risks and costs.

The Computer Science Course of UCPel is one of the best organized in the Rio Grande do Sul, for its infrastructure, for teaching, for research laboratories, for the library and the faculty, composed exclusively by PHD teachers.

The course trains professionals for the development of related activities and maintenance of computers, installation and configuration of operating systems, network administration and support, development of computer and database skills programs from object-oriented structures and computational solutions to web and mobile devices.
